hotels.title: Chennai City Stay Minutes from Thiruvanmiyur Beach
hotels.description: Only minutes from the sea, Holiday Inn Chennai OMR IT Expressway, an IHG Hotel, is a soothing oasis with easy access to the Tamil Nadu capital's hottest destinations. Amble alongside the seashore of Thiruvanmiyur Beach or stay in to take advantage of the outdoor pool. Savour global cuisines at the onsite restaurant, indulge in a day of adventure at the VGP Universal Kingdom theme park or take a walk on the wild side with a safari at Arignar Anna Zoological Park.
